revised_title: Plant Breeding Strategies for Enhanced Agricultural Productivity in the 1980s
tldr: This article discusses the role of plant breeding in enhancing agricultural productivity during the 1980s. It highlights the importance of optimizing plant structure, physiological response, and partitioning of assimilates for improved yield and quality. The author also emphasizes the need for disease resistance and the potential for further yield advances in the coming decades.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Science
